name: Mars Expedition
description: Join us on an unforgettable journey to the Red Planet.

name: Moon Adventure
description: Experience the thrill of walking on the Moon.

description: Spend a week aboard the International Space Station.

description: Be part of a pioneering crew to mine valuable resources from asteroids.

description: Explore the stunning and diverse moons of Jupiter.

description: Venture into the unknown with our deep space exploration missions.

description: Contribute to building and living in the first human colony on Mars.

description: Enjoy a luxury vacation in space with breathtaking views of Earth.

description: Get up close to the magnificent rings of Saturn.

name: Mars Rover Driver
description: Take control of a Mars rover and explore the Martian surface.
